name: Nice Dice
description:
"Nice Dice" is all about being nice! Well not really, but at least you are a Dice right? So why don't you try to prove it! Shooter game inspired by "Worms" with dice instead of worms. 

Every turn roll the die you are playing for and get the random weapon, shoot it and the next player continues, try for yourself and let us know what you think! 

Have more fun with your friends on Local-Multiplayer!

Team:

@pavelsima (Coding/Level Design),  @Filípo (Art/Level Design),  @ThreePaths (Music/SFX)

Controls:

Use WSAD to move and jump, mouse to aim and shoot.
To return to the menu use Esc.
